title: iOptron 80mm White Light Solar Scope review
description: The iOptron 80mm scope is easy to use and suited to both white-light solar viewing and nighttime observations.
content: The iOptron 80mm scope is easy to use and suited to both white-light solar viewing and nighttime observations.
